name: Scholarship Management System
description: A web-based application that helps students apply for scholarships, track applications, and receive updates.
challenges: Ensuring secure authentication and smooth application tracking.
future_plans: Implement AI-based eligibility prediction and add an admin dashboard.

name: E-Commerce Website
description: A fully functional e-commerce site with product browsing, cart management, and secure checkout.
challenges: Integrating real-time payment processing and handling cart state efficiently.
future_plans: Add multi-vendor support and integrate AI-powered recommendations.

name: Job Finder App
description: A job portal where users can search for jobs, apply online, and track application status.
challenges: Implementing efficient job filtering and resume upload functionality.
future_plans: Introduce AI-based job matching and a salary prediction feature.
